title: 820-00923-A, known good tp/kb ribbon, not working.
message: Board had slight bend, replaced pretty much everything, but the board never seems to work with built in tp/kb. Bought a macbook pro to test and the parts I got are good on the test system. the tp feedback still works, not that it matters with this design, but 3.3v and 5v are also present. Afraid this is a bad solider joint somewhere on the I2C SCL/SDA lines but am open to looking at other things. What would you look at first to narrow down the source cause here? I don't know how to test these signal lines.

title: 820-00923-A, known good tp/kb ribbon, not working.
message:
Any more information about how the problem appeared?

I suppose your problem is trackpad related.
KB can't work also, if TP is not working.

Check all TPAD_SPI resistors and traces.

title: 820-00923-A, known good tp/kb ribbon, not working.
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 100423, member: 682"]
Any more information about how the problem appeared?
[/QUOTE]

Body bent, not much but enough.[ATTACH]61239[/ATTACH]
Looking at R4513 first, and it was missing. Pretty sure this is now solved. Will verify by end of the day, just for a few things to do first.
